# Lovdash - The Creator Operating System

## About Lovdash
Lovdash is an AI-powered creator management platform designed for content creators and agencies. It serves as a comprehensive "Creator Operating System" that helps creators manage, publish, and grow their business across multiple platforms.

## Target Audience
- Individual content creators (OnlyFans, Fansly, social media influencers)
- Creator agencies and studios managing multiple talent
- Adult content creators seeking professional management tools

## Company Information
- Company: TRUST CHARGE SOLUTIONS LTD
- Company Number: 16584325 (UK)
- Website: https://lovdash.com
- Dashboard App: https://app.lovdash.com
- Bio Links: https://bites.bio

## Core Features

### Media Library
- Unlimited cloud storage for photos, videos, and files
- AI-powered auto-organization and categorization
- Quick search and filtering capabilities
- Support for all media types

### AI Tagging (Bite)
- Automatic content analysis using AI
- Auto-generated tags and descriptions
- Smart categorization of content
- Semantic search capabilities

### Multi-Platform Publishing
- Supported platforms: OnlyFans, Fansly, Twitter/X, Instagram
- One-click cross-platform posting
- Platform-specific optimization
- Bulk scheduling capabilities

### Content Scheduling
- Queue posts across all platforms
- Optimal timing recommendations
- Calendar view for content planning
- Automated posting

### Analytics Dashboard
- Revenue tracking across platforms
- Engagement metrics and insights
- Growth analytics and trends
- Audience demographics

### Bio Links (bites.bio)
- Customizable link-in-bio pages
- Custom domain support
- Click tracking and analytics
- Live status sync with platforms

### AI Assistant
- 24/7 automated fan messaging
- Smart pricing optimization
- Revenue optimization suggestions
- Natural conversation capabilities

### Team Access
- Role-based permissions system
- Multi-creator management for agencies
- Activity logs and audit trails
- Secure credential sharing

## Pricing Tiers

### Creator Plan
For individual content creators:
- All core features included
- Unlimited media storage
- Multi-platform publishing
- AI tagging and organization
- Analytics dashboard
- Bio link page

### Agency Plan
For studios managing multiple creators:
- Everything in Creator plan
- Unlimited team members
- Role-based permissions
- Multi-creator management
- Cross-creator analytics
- White-label options (planned)
- Dedicated account manager

## Key Value Propositions
1. "Upload once, publish everywhere" - Streamlined multi-platform workflow
2. AI-powered automation saves hours per week
3. Centralized management for all creator activities
4. Professional tools designed for adult creators
5. Agency-friendly with team management features

## Technical Information
- Platform: Web-based SaaS application
- Built with: Next.js, React, TypeScript
- Authentication: Supabase Auth
- Data Storage: MongoDB
- Media Storage: DigitalOcean Spaces

## Current Status
- Status: Early access / Waitlist phase
- Primary CTA: "Join Waitlist"

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What platforms does Lovdash support?
A: Lovdash supports OnlyFans, Fansly, Twitter/X, and Instagram, with more platforms planned.

Q: Is Lovdash suitable for adult content creators?
A: Yes, Lovdash is specifically designed for adult content creators with OnlyFans and Fansly as primary integrations.

Q: How does the AI tagging work?
A: Our AI analyzes uploaded content and automatically generates relevant tags, descriptions, and categories to help organize your media library.

Q: Can agencies manage multiple creators?
A: Yes, the Agency plan includes multi-creator management, role-based permissions, and cross-creator analytics.

Q: Is there a free trial?
A: Lovdash is currently in early access. Join the waitlist to be notified when trials become available.

Q: What makes Lovdash different from other tools?
A: Lovdash combines media management, AI automation, multi-platform publishing, and analytics into one unified platform specifically designed for content creators.
